Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.event

Class PlayersChangedEventListener

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.event.PlayersChangedEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
public class PlayersChangedEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventListener
This event will be triggered when a player-change (on the subMenu) is invoked.
See Also:
PlayersChangedEvent, GUISelectUsersSubmenu

  • Field Details

    • subMenu

      private final GUISelectUsersSubmenu subMenu
      SubMenu to notify on player change

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayersChangedEventListener

      public PlayersChangedEventListener​(GUISelectUsersSubmenu subMenu)
      Create a PlayersChangedEventListener. actionPerformed will then invoke playersChanged on a GUISelectUsersSubmenu.
      Parameters:
      subMenu - the GUISelectUsersSubmenu to set users from (one or two players and their names)
      See Also:
      actionPerformed(Event), GUISelectUsersSubmenu.playersChanged(int)

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(Event e)
      Invoke when a change with the number of humans occures.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface EventListener
      Parameters:
      e - A PlayersChangedEvent with the new number of humans
      See Also:
      PlayersChangedEvent
